channel.title: Takeover Bid on FinanClub

item.title: M
item.description: score:-44 Chances: Macy’s foot traffic in the US dropped 2.49% in 2023, with bigger decreases during the holiday shopping season. Tony Spring Takes Helm as Chief Executive Officer and Chair-Elect of Macy’s, Inc. Private-equity firm Sycamore Partners considering a potential bid to purchase Macy’s.
